description: '''Yotuel Omar Romero Manzanares''' (born October 6, 1976), mononymously known as '''Yotuel''', is a Cuban singer, actor, and current lead singer and co-writer of the 2003 [[Latin Grammy Award]]-winning [[Platinum album]]-selling rap group [[Orishas (band)|Orishas]]. Among other recordings, ''[[Emigrante (Orishas album)|Emigrante]]'' won the 2003 Latin Grammy Award for Best Rap/Hip-Hop Album. This same album was also nominated for the [[Grammy Awards of 2003|2003 Grammy Award]] for Best Latin Rock/Alternative Album.
